title: New free champion rotation: Varus, Soraka, Kassadin and more!

Did someone say purple?{{champion:117}}
Plus Vel'Koz and Kha'Zix have six letters in their names, and half of six is three.

{{champion:161}} Vel'koz has THREE tentacles based on his back in a triangle. When he ults said triangle is visible. He is also a giant floating eye. {{champion:121}} Kha'zix has THREE evolution points. A champion usually gets a skill full at level 9, which is HALF way through it's LIFE in-match. Half-life 3 is a Patriot conspiracy, and Riot's just another pawn playing their role.

{{champion:266}} Every THREE attacks I get more LIFE back, and if below HALF LIFE, I get THREE times as much LIFE.
 
 
 
Therefore, {{champion:201}}  Confirmed
^^^ Oh my god I can't tell you how much my mind is blown right now.

This is so simple Dr. Mundo, Kassadin, Kennen, Kha'Zix, Malzahar, Morgana, Skarner, Soraka, Varus, Vel'Koz. D K / K K / M M / S S / V V All the names have a first letter that have a pair. But the D K and that is the name of a monkey. Which means the next champion is a monkey type. Maybe a friend of Wukong. Also there are 4 Void champs and 4 primary Mages. 2 of those are Void champions so you cancel them out. Kass and kha are both assassins so then you look at the secondarys which is fighter and mage. So the new champion is a fighter mage. But then the t from Kha is missing in fighter. So that means any secondary that starts with t means something. But from before the void creatures take up the    V V and the mages take up M M and one of the secondary tanks are (SK)arner Which takes up the S S and the K K. So then the only secondary tank left is Mundo. So if you take away the t from the tank you get ank. Then you add a H and get Hank. So all of this means that the new champion is a Fighter Mage, Monkey whos friend is Wukong and his name is Hank. Also one more thing there are 3 K's which mean something. If you take monkey and take the K out you get money. Which means Rito wants all are money.
The Conspiracy Theory is real

Three k's you say?

Clearly this is a message. {{champion:24}} was left out, which means that he must be trapped in the other guy left out, {{champion:13}}'s Rune Prism. {{champion:45}} Was trying to save him, but then {{champion:134}}, {{champion:91}}, and {{champion:12}} appeared and used {{item:3001}} to finish the job. {{champion:28}} was viewing this by pure happenstance whilst jungling, and ran to seek help from the blue champions, whose leader was {{champion:34}}. She needed help to stop the now corrupt purple team.


The next game mode is "Purple Versus Blue" with Jax and Evelynn left out. The teams have already been arranged for this epic battle since the very beginning.

Get ready for the final showdown.
